title: Filter Care for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video to care for your filter on your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot.  Perform the filter care procedure to keep Braava jet™ running at peak performance. Pull from the rim of the tank to remove the filter. Avoid pulling from the tank cap. Turn the filter upside down and run it under warm tap water. To reinstall, align the filter with the tank opening and push straight down until it clicks into place.

asset.title: Filter Care for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video to care for your filter on your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot.  Perform the filter care procedure to keep Braava jet™ running at peak performance. Pull from the rim of the tank to remove the filter. Avoid pulling from the tank cap. Turn the filter upside down and run it under warm tap water. To reinstall, align the filter with the tank opening and push straight down until it clicks into place.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot
